Recap: Reva arrives home to learn that Jonathan now has a job with Lewis Construction. She and Josh try to talk out some of their problems and are able to work through a few. Jonathan agrees to work undercover for Lewis Construction to get the scoop on Spaulding Enterprises. He continues to get instructions from a mysterious source. Tony is pronounced dead while Danny and Michelle are taken to Cedars. Marina misunderstands something that Danny says and thinks that it is Michelle that he wants by his side instead of her. She sadly steps aside to give Danny what she believes he needs. Ray is devastated when he learns of Tony's death. He gives Tony his last rights. Cassie and Jeffrey share a kiss before Cassie breaks away and tells him that she isn't being fair to him. Edmund tells the boys, Cassie and Dinah goodbye. Dinah is determined to go with him to San Cristobel. Cassie is shocked to get a legal document informing her that she is in danger of losing her son.
Transcript: Jonathan: Yeah, well, it's not my fault reva decided to move to aspen. No. Josh was just joking about the job thing, so I can't play that angle either. Okay? Look, I have to go. Good-bye. Paging reva lewis. Paging reva lewis. Please claim your son at gate 17.
Reva: ( Laughs )
Jonathan: ( Laughs ) mommy!
Reva: Ooh!
Jonathan: Welcome back.
Reva: How... how long have i been away?
Josh: You don't look like a happy camper, young man.
Bill: Hey.
Josh: What's the problem?
Bill: Well, same old, same old. The wife, business.
Josh: ( Chuckles ) what did olivia do now?
Bill: Pierce account. Olivia kept me preoccupied while alan closed the deal for spaulding.
Josh: Hm.
Bill: Or maybe you already know this. That's why you wanted to see me? Is that what's going on?
Josh: Nope.
Bill: You said there was a problem.
Josh: Yes.
Bill: Which is?
Josh: Same old, same old. The wife, the business.
Dinah: Hey. Are we going on a trip?
Edmund: Solo journey, dinah. I'm leaving for san cristobel tonight.
Dinah: Oh. Consulate business?
Edmund: No, it's a personal matter.
Dinah: How long are you going to be gone for?
Edmund: Until you've given birth.
Dinah: Wait, what? Why... I don't understand. I need you.
Edmund: Cassie will be here to see you through the pregnancy.
Dinah: Is this because my parents threatened you?
Edmund: Oh, god, I don't scare that easily, dinah.
Dinah: Well, then tell me why you're leaving, edmund.
Edmund: I told cassie I was going, hoping she'd realize how much she needs me.
Dinah: And how's that working out for you?
Edmund: She really wants me to go.
Jeffrey: Hello.
Cassie: Ooh!
Jeffrey: Hi.
Cassie: Hi.
Jeffrey: You all right?
Cassie: Yeah. Hi.
Jeffrey: Sorry. So, how are you? How are things at the house since I left?
Cassie: Uh... tense and tenser.
Jeffrey: Listen, I spoke with judge ellis about that restraining order you wanted for ross and vanessa.
Cassie: Thank you.
Jeffrey: Sure.
Cassie: Thanks for sticking by my side with vanessa. She's pretty tough.
Jeffrey: It's all right. How are the kids? Are they coming home soon?
Cassie: Yes, tonight, and i can't wait to see them.
Jeffrey: I wonder how they're going to react to auntie dinah moving in.
Cassie: Well, I'm more concerned about how they're going to react to edmund moving out. He's leaving town.
Jeffrey: Cassie, that's the best news I've had in months.
Marina: ( Sighs ) danny said he'd call, and he will.
Police scanner: Accident. Laurel falls.
Marina: What? Oh, come on.
Police scanner: Paramedics headed out. Man critical. Santos.
Marina: Danny.
Michelle: Come on, keep the compressions going. Tony? Come on, tony. Tony. Come on, please, you've got to keep fighting.
Danny: Michelle, he doesn't have a heartbeat.
Michelle: Tony? Tony, do you hear me?
Danny: Michelle, he doesn't have a heartbeat.
Michelle: Listen, tony...
Danny: He hasn't had a heartbeat since I brought him up here, michelle.
Michelle: We are fighting with you, tony, okay? You've got to fight with us. Come on.
Danny: Michelle, he doesn't have a heartbeat.
Michelle: No!
Danny: He hasn't had one since I brought him up here.
Michelle: No! Tony, please. Tony, we love you.
Danny: Michelle, he's gone.
Michelle: No, he's not gone!
Danny: He's gone.
Michelle: No.
Danny: Let him go. Let him go.
Michelle: ( Sobbing )
Danny: Please let him go.
Michelle: Oh, god! Tony. Tony. ( Sobbing )
Jonathan: So what do you think?
Reva: You clean up good, kid. Who died?
Jonathan: No one. I'm trying to make a good impression.
Reva: Court date?
Jonathan: ( Laughs ) no. I got a new job.
Reva: Wow.
Jonathan: Mom, you're looking at the newest employee of lewis construction.
Bill: You hired jonathan?
Josh: Look, I know you're not a fan of jonathan's, and quite frankly, neither am I.
Bill: He's a menace to society.
Josh: But perhaps he has untapped potential.
Bill: Potential to destroy our company.
Josh: No, you're giving him way too much credit here, bill. Now, don't worry, okay? I'll make sure he's under constant surveillance.
Bill: If you say so. But why don't you tell me the real story? What's jonathan got on you?
Reva: What have you got on josh?
Jonathan: Nothing. He thinks I'm a one-man wrecking crew, so maybe he has something for me in demolition.
Reva: Or you blackmailed him into giving you the job.
Jonathan: Fine. You want the truth? You got it.
Josh: Okay, the truth is, i did it for reva.
Bill: Well, I thought you wanted him to be far away as possible from her.
Josh: I do, but that's not what she wants.
Bill: Did you tell my dad about this?
Josh: No. So I had to make an executive decision. What do you think about it?
Bill: I think it's a great idea that you're hiring him.
Reva: This was josh's idea?
Jonathan: Yeah. He offered me the job, no strings attached. At first I turned him down, of course.
Reva: Well, of course. Why take a nine-to-five when hustling pool at farley's is a full-time job?
Jonathan: ( Laughs ) I like the way you think. But josh came to me a second time and insisted that I take the job, so he made me an offer that I couldn't refuse.
Josh: Look, I don't want to come off like some mafia don pulling your strings in the shadows, all right? You are the man that runs lewis construction.
Bill: Yeah, I know. So when does jonathan start?
Josh: About 15 minutes ago.
Jonathan: Josh isn't big on the whole punctuality thing, is he?
Reva: Why?
Jonathan: Well, it's my first day at work and I'm already running late. ( Laughter )
Jeffrey: So edmund is moving out?
Cassie: Yes. He'll be back for the birth of the baby.
Jeffrey: Oh, well, that's a shame.
Cassie: He is the father of the baby.
Jeffrey: Unlucky kid.
Cassie: Do you have to be the most insensitive person I know?
Jeffrey: Yeah, I probably am, but that's what you like about me, right?
Cassie: You're impossible.
Jeffrey: And arrogant and self-serving. I've heard it all before.
Cassie: Yes, you are. But you make me laugh and I need that right now.

Jeffrey: I know. And I know that it's been very rough for you lately and I'm sorry about that. But I'm not sorry that edmund's moving out and I sure as hell am not sorry that you're going to be alone for a while.
Dinah: Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa. We have a deal. You don't leave now.
Edmund: The deal is and always has been, dinah, that while you're carrying this child, cassie and I are its legal and biological parents, which means we call the shots. It's what cassie wants.
Dinah: Edmund, why are we not talking about what I want?
Edmund: I would hope you'd want the child to develop in a peaceful environment.
Dinah: Well, how am I going to do that with you thousands of miles away? Edmund, hey, I feel safe with you. And I don't want you to go. But if you have to go, I'm going with you.
Detective: Mr. Santos? I need you to explain to me what happened.
Michelle: It was an accident. Mr. Santos was protecting me, and tony slipped and fell off the cliff. Detective, he needs to get himself to a hospital.
Danny: ( Shivering ) no, I'll be okay. I'm okay.
Michelle: Danny, you're shivering.
Detective: You need to check this guy out.
Michelle: You're probably hypothermic.
Danny: I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm all right. I'm not going to the hospital. I'm not going to the...
Paramedic: Let's get you into the ambulance, huh?
Danny: I'm not going to the hospital.
Michelle: Danny. Danny, listen to me. You have to get medical attention, okay? I'm not going to lose you, too, okay? This is all my fault. This is all my fault. ( Crying )
Danny: It's not your fault.
Michelle: It's all my fault.
Danny: It's not your fault. No, it's not your fault.
Marina: Oh, my god. Danny. No!
Paramedic: Miss. Ma'am, please.
Marina: No! Leave me alone.
Marina: Danny.
Danny: ( Shivering ) marina.
Marina: Oh, my god. On the police report, they said there was an accident at laurel falls, and they said something about "santos," and I thought...
Danny: It was tony.
Marina: Oh, my god.
Danny: ( Shivering )
Marina: Are you okay?
Danny: Uh-huh. Uh-huh. I'm fine.
Marina: Oh, michelle. I'm so sorry.
Michelle: So am I.
Danny: Stop blaming yourself. Okay?
Marina: How did... how did he...?
Danny: We started fighting. He got angry, and we... we just were fighting and he fell.
Michelle: I tried so hard to pull him up. I couldn't pull him up. Tony.
Danny: And he fell. He fell.
Marina: Danny!
Michelle: We need help here now!
Marina: Danny, can you hear me?
Michelle: Danny...
Marina: He's unconscious.
Michelle: Danny. Danny, open your eyes. Come on, open your eyes.
Reva: I'm very proud of you. I am. I just am so proud of you. My little baby boy's all grown up.
Jonathan: Well, it's a step up from boosting cds, I guess.

Reva: No, no, it's more than that. I know you don't need the money. I mean, I know you have your trust fund. So I'd like to think of this as you taking a step in the right direction, and I would like to think that I might have had something to do with that.
Jonathan: You must be kind of happy, though, that this mother- son bonding thing is over.
Reva: Over?
Jonathan: Yeah. I mean, now that I'm on my own, you and josh can start living the good life. Move to aspen...
Reva: Sounds like you're trying to get rid of me.

Jonathan: No. I mean, you did the mom thing and I really appreciate that, but josh would love to see me in his rearview mirror, and you deserve a break. I'm okay. I don't need you. For a good reason. You understand?
Reva: Yeah. Sure.
Jonathan: All right. Come on. I got a clock to punch.
Edmund: Dinah, in a perfect world, I wouldn't miss a day of this pregnancy, but it's not a perfect world. I can't have everything i want...
Dinah: Exactly. Exactly. That's what this is about.
Edmund: And it's taken me a long time to accept that.
Dinah: You know something? You and I started this together. Your baby is right here. We can go to san cristobel, but you are not going to miss a single day of this baby's life.
Edmund: Yes, I am. Because cassie wants me to leave.
Dinah: What are you talking about? No. No. We will go, but we're going to go together. What is going on? Is this a plot? What is it? You can tell me.
Edmund: Dinah, the only thing I'm going to tell you is that cassie is bringing the boys here, we are going to tell them together, and then I am going to san cristobel alone.
Dinah: Alone?
Edmund: Alone.
Dinah: Alone?
Edmund: Alone.
Dinah: What, and that's that?
Edmund: That's that. And then cassie is going to realize how much she needs me and she's going to ask me to come back.
Jeffrey: What are you doing?
Cassie: Now?
Jeffrey: Where are you going?
Cassie: Why?
Jeffrey: I was just wondering, you know, if... if you were busy.
Cassie: I have to pick up the boys and take them home to see edmund to say good-bye.
Jeffrey: And then?
Cassie: And then what?
Jeffrey: Edmund's gone. And then?
Cassie: And then... Coming up on "guiding light"...
Reva: I love you and I love our life. It's just, I need to start over, joshua.
Cassie: This isn't fair to you.
Jeffrey: Well, you know what? Cassie, I've been running away from complicated my whole life, and our situation seems very simple to me.
Jeffrey: Yeah, well, I hear you're good at multitasking.
Cassie: This isn't fair to you. Everything is so complicated.
Jeffrey: Well, you know what? Cassie, I've been running away from "complicated" my whole life and our situation seems very simple to me.
Cassie: I've got to go.
Josh: This is great. His first day on the job; he's over an hour late.
Bill: Well, maybe he got a better offer.
Josh: Maybe he got himself arrested.
Bill: No such luck.
Jonathan: Jonathan randall reporting for duty.
Josh: You're late.
Reva: It's my fault.
Bill: Hey. ( Laughter )
Josh: I wasn't expecting you to come home tonight.
Reva: Yeah, well, he picked me up at the airport.
Josh: Welcome home.
Reva: Thanks. Thank you.
Josh: Next time you're going to be late, you call.
Jonathan: Yes, sir.
Josh: Okay. Now, we have some catching up to do, don't we?
Reva: Now?
Josh: Yeah, yeah. Bill will run jonathan through the paces. He's the boss, right?
Bill: Yeah, hey. Why don't we step outside and I'll go over the job description?
Jonathan: Sure. Let's do it.
Josh: What's wrong?
Reva: Nothing.
Josh: I thought you'd be happy that I was bringing jonathan into the family business.
Reva: I am!
Josh: Okay. ( Laughs ) then what's the problem? And don't tell me it's jet lag.
Reva: You know me, I'm just out of sorts lately.
Josh: Oh. Reva shayne lewis out of sorts. I'd better run$and hide.
Reva: You know, why is it that everyone wants to run away from me right now?
Josh: I don'T. In fact, I'm looking forward to having more of you.
Reva: I'm sorry I've been so weird. ( Laughs )
Josh: I prefer to think of it as challenging.
Jonathan: Got to tell you, uncle bill, I'm a little surprised you'd give me a job at lewis construction.
Bill: Well, I'm doing josh a favor. No need to put another marriage on the rocks.
Jonathan: So josh only gave me the job because of reva?
Bill: And I'm keeping you around because of olivia.
Josh: So how were your last few days in aspen?
Reva: Beautiful scenery, beautiful people. Lonely.
Josh: Yeah, I'm sorry i wasn't there.
Reva: No, it's not that.
Josh: Thank you.
Reva: You know what I mean.
Josh: No, actually, I don't know what you mean, and that's part of the problem. I just thought that you'd be happy that jonathan now has a chance to stand on his own two feet.
Reva: I am. And I'm even happier that you were able to get by the past and give him a chance.
Josh: Well, he's your son, reva. It means a lot to you to have him be a part of your life, part of our lives. And I know with jonathan it's never going to be easy, but...
Reva: Yeah, well, like mother, like son.
Josh: I just figured if i could get him more connected to the family, you know?
Reva: And once he's connected, then I'll go away again. Maybe that's the way it's supposed to be.
Josh: Look, if you're not happy about aspen, we can just forget about it, okay? It was just supposed to be a vacation getaway. Springfield will always be our home.
Reva: Home's different now. I love you and I love our life. It's just...
Josh: Different.
Reva: The kids are adults now and they're living lives of their own.
Josh: That means we can have more time together.
Reva: I need to start over, joshua. I don't know whether that should be in aspen, but I know I need a new beginning.
Josh: What does that mean?
Reva: Why does it have to mean anything? Isn't it obvious?
Josh: Not to me. No. I'm sorry, I...
Reva: What are you sorry for?
Josh: I don't know. I'm just... I'm trying here, okay, reva? You're pushing me away and i don't have a clue as to why.
Reva: You know what? Maybe you're just sorry that i came back too soon.
Josh: Where are you going?
Reva: Like you said, I don't have a clue. ( Laughs )
Doctor: What have we got?
Michelle: He passed out.
Paramedic: Body temp 94. Pulse 126. Borderline shock.
Michelle: He was in the water, so I think it's probably hypothermia.
Doctor: I'm sorry. Only one of you can stay here with him. Excuse me.
Michelle: Go ahead. You stay.
Marina: Are you sure?
Michelle: Yeah. Can I get just a minute please? Would that be okay? Oh, tony. I never meant to hurt you. I owe you my life, you know that? I couldn't save yours. I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry.
Doctor: His core temperature is low. He's got some contusions, bruised ribs.
Marina: Well, how serious is it?
Doctor: We'll know more after we take some x-rays.
Marina: Can I stay with him? Hey. Me and my great ideas, huh? Leaving you at laurel falls. Danny? Hey, danny, it's okay. It's okay, you're at cedars.
Danny: Michelle.
Marina: Hang on, I'll go get her for you.
Danny: Michelle, where's marina? I want to talk to marina.
Rey: Danny! Danny, it's ray.
Danny: Ray.

Ray: No, no, no. Don't try to talk. You're okay. That's all that matters. I got a call to give last rites. They warned me it was a family member, but you're okay. Whew. Man, am I glad you don't need my services.
Danny: Ray. Ray.
Ray: What is it? Are you in pain?
Danny: Ray... ray, it's tony. He needs you.
Edmund: Hey, I thought i heard voices. Come here.
R.J.: Edmund!
Edmund: ( Laughs ) there you are. I missed you both so much. How are you?
R.J.: Are these yours?

Edmund: Yes, they are. Yes, they're mine. I'M... I'm going away on a little trip. You went away on a trip, and now it's my turn. And the only bad part about it is I won't have much time to spend with you because I'm leaving tonight. Come here. Come here. I want to talk to you guys. You come right there. You sit there and you-- whoo-- you sit right there and I sit next to you. I'm going away on a very important mission. But you have a very important mission, too, right here. Right here, because I'm leaving you two in charge.
R.J.: We're too little.

Edmund: No, you're not. You're not too little. I think you're completely up to the task. And the biggest part about the task is you make sure you watch after those two, because they're going to try to paint the outside of the house pink. They're going to try to take you shopping every week, and they're going to try to-- worst thing of all-- have slumber parties. And we can't have that, can we?
Will: No.
R.J.: No way.
Edmund: Absolutely not, right? No slumber parties. So you have to be right on top of your toes. Are we clear about that?
R.J.: Mm-hmm.
Edmund: All right, gentlemen. As you were.
R.J.: Will you be back next week to take us to the lake?
Edmund: Well, no, not next week.
Will: The one after that?
Edmund: Well, no, I'm afraid it's going to be probably a little bit longer than that.
Dinah: This is tearing them apart. Do not let him go.
Cassie: Stay out of this, dinah. All right, guys. You guys need to give edmund a hug.

Edmund: Come on. Come on. Big hug. Give me a big hug. I'm going to miss the two of you so much. I will see you when I get back, and that's going to be a very special time for all of us, okay? Come on, you sit down over here. Okay, bye. Bye.
Will: Don't go, edmund!
R.J.: Mommy, make edmund stay.
Edmund: Don't worry. We'll be in touch and time will go very, very quickly, okay?
R.J.: Promise?
Edmund: I promise, I promise.
Dinah: Do you guys want a few minutes alone?

Cassie: Hey, guys. Can you stay in here with dinah, please? Maybe this was a mistake, having you leave at the same moment that they're coming home. I'm sorry that you had to have a good-bye like that.
Edmund: No need to apologize. I'm just glad I had even a few minutes with them.
Cassie: But they're going to be fine, you know.
Edmund: Yes. Take care of yourself and I will call you, and I will see you for the big day.
Cassie: Okay.
Edmund: I love you.
Josh: I'd like to send a drink to the gorgeous blonde with the handful of napkins over there?
Reva: I hear you, joshua.
Josh: Oh, I'm sorry. My name is joshua lewis. Nice to meet you.
Reva: What are you doing?
Josh: I'm just trying to strike up a conversation with the most beautiful woman in the room.
Reva: I saw your wedding band. What about your wife?
Josh: My wife has disappeared. The woman who took her place doesn't seem to understand me.
Reva: Is that so?
Josh: Maybe you can help me straighten her out.
Reva: "Straighten her out"?

Josh: Here's the situation. I love her more than I ever have, but she has these blinders on right now that keep her from seeing what an incredible person she is and how much her family needs her and how much I need her. So I'm trying to figure out a way to take those blinders off, to help her to do that. Do you have any ideas?
Reva: Buy me that drink, and we'll see what we can come up with.
Bill: You got a great relationship with your aunt olivia, and she does work for the competition, so...
Jonathan: You're going to pit me against my aunt liv?
Bill: No. But spaulding is a company that plays dirty. And lewis, well, we try not to, but sometimes you do what you have to do.
Jonathan: Yeah, mom told me you guys have been known to break a few rules. You wildcatters.
Bill: Yeah, well, everyone breaks a rule or two from time to time. Some just do it more than others, like the spauldings. And we're just trying to think more like them these days.
Jonathan: They really are the black hat in this one-horse town, huh?
Bill: And I think you can help with them. Maybe do a little undercover work?
Jonathan: Here I am trying to go straight and you want to throw me right back in the shell game, huh?
Bill: Take it or leave it.
Jonathan: All right. You got yourself an undercover guy.
Bill: Well, welcome to lewis construction. See you in the morning. 8:00.
Jonathan: 8:00?
Bill: Sharp.
Jonathan: ( Sighs )
Delivery guy: Excuse me?
Jonathan: Hm?
Delivery guy: Do you know a jonathan randall?
Jonathan: Yeah, you're looking at him. Who died?
Delivery guy: Well, these are for you.
Jonathan: Unlikely, dude. Who would send me flowers?
Delivery guy: Don't ask me, bro. I just deliver them.
Jonathan: "A welcome home gift for reva and congrats on the new job. Don't lie to us again."
Ray: I'd been so hard on him lately. Why couldn't I just be happy for him, just once? Just once, instead of judging him all the time. Oh, god. ( Sobs )
Danny: Ray, he always knew that you loved him. You never let him down.
Ray: He loved you, too, danny. You know that.
Danny: I tried to look out for him, ray. I really did. I don't know how we ended up here.
Ray: It was an accident. It was an accident, wasn't it?

Danny: We were both hanging from the ledge and michelle was trying to hold on to both of us, but there was no way she could hold on to both of us. So tony chose to let go. I don't know why. But I'm here because he did.
Michelle: Danny was asking for me?
Marina: Michelle, um, I know what happened at laurel falls. You broke things off with tony so that you and danny could be together.
Michelle: Marina, I really don't think we should talk about this right now.
Marina: Well, I just... i just want you to know that i care about danny a lot. We have something really good together. And I love him enough to back off.
Michelle: Marina...
Marina: No. Michelle, what's happened, it'S... it's huge, and I just want him to be okay. So if he needs you to do that, I'll walk away.
Ray: He needs you.
Cassie: Okay, there you go. You know what, guys? I think we're going to be fine, right? It's just going to be us, and we can do this.
R.J.: Yeah.

Cassie: You know what we should do? We should call tammy, and we should see if she wants to come over and spend some time... ( knock at door ) hey, maybe that's her. Excuse me. Well, that's weird. From san cristobel. Oh, my god. Oh, no. No, not now. Oh, my god, you can't take my child away.
Dinah: Wait, wait.
Edmund: Dinah, stop following me.
Dinah: No. I am trying to keep you from making the biggest mistake of your life.
Edmund: Go back to the farmhouse.
Dinah: No. We're doing this together.
Edmund: Dinah, I don't need your help. I will win cassie back. I will. I will. I have faith. Excuse me.

Dinah: Edmund... oh, boy. There's a fine line between faith and denial. It's a very good thing daddy has me to figure things out. Hi. Hi. Can I get a one-way ticket to san cristobel, please? First class. Thank you. Okay. It's all right, don't worry. Everything's going to be fine. Daddy isn't going anywhere without us.
Reva: You still know how to romance a gal, bud.
Josh: You make it easy.
Reva: ( Laughs )
Jonathan: I stay or I go. Either way reva gets hurt.
Ray: Through this holy anointing, by the tender mercy of our lord, may he pardon whatever sins you have committed. Through sight... ...through hearing... ( music playing )
[NEXT_ON]
Harley: You don't want me to catch the real killer. You want me to stay here, stuck in this place with you. Well, don't you?
Mallet: You tell me, harley.
Edmund: Dinah is not my pawn.
Ross: Edmund, you took advantage of her feelings for you and used her in the worst possible way, and that's why i want you on that plane and out of my daughter's life.
Cassie: Something's happened.
Jeffrey: What's wrong?
Cassie: I need you, more than I ever have.
